QuestData.Title: Testing the Untested
QuestData.Description:
During a swarm, the mantid send their youngest in great numbers against the enemy to test their mettle. Those who survive join the swarm as true warriors of the mantid.
We should do our best to ensure that they don't make it through this test.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Vil'thik Swarmborn in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
